goals.title: Our goals
goals.description: The academy aims to qualify and raise the efficiency of individuals to meet professional challenges and adapt to market requirements. This is done by offering specialized training courses in various fields such as leadership, personal development, technology, and languages. In addition, the academy provides in-person and live training options to meet everyone's needs.

about.title: About us
about.description: The academy aims to qualify and raise the efficiency of individuals to meet professional challenges and adapt to market requirements. This is done by offering specialized training courses in various fields such as leadership, personal development, technology, and languages. In addition, the academy provides in-person and live training options to meet everyone's needs.

servicesSection.title: Our vision and mission
servicesSection.vision_desc: The academy strives to be an intellectual catalyst and an incubator of progress for human development.
servicesSection.mission_desc: The academy aims to provide knowledge and expertise in various disciplines and innovative solutions according to international standards, making the academy a beacon of progress and societal advancement.

aboutUspage.title: About Academy
aboutUspage.aboutus-content: Our academy is a basic and continuous training institution registered with the Ministry of Training and Employment under number 19-055-73. It specializes in the field of training and self and professional development. The academy organizes courses in various fields, both in-person and online, presented by a group of distinguished trainers with expertise from within and outside the Republic of Tunisia. Our goal is to develop individuals and society, enhance their capabilities on a personal and professional level, and expand their options.
aboutUspage.vision-content: AlRaeed Academy for Training and Development aspires to be a distinguished center in the field of training and development, contributing to the building of individuals and institutions, and the enhancement of skills and capabilities.
aboutUspage.mission-content: To provide outstanding training courses and services for individuals and institutions, contributing to their personal growth and the development of their skills and capabilities.
aboutUspage.services-content:
AlRaeaed Academy for Training and Development offers its participants training courses in various fields to elevate the level of the trainee, enhance their competencies, and develop their skills, including:
 Professional crafts 
 Self-development 
  Languages

footer.intro: A training and formation center that offers courses in self-development, as well as continuing and basic vocational training

map.address: Habib Bourguiba Avenue - First floor of Tunisie Telecom Building, Kebili - Tunisia
